pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Additional Tools for Alternative Shared Frailty Models // Provide estimation and data generation tools for some new multivariate frailty models. This version includes the gamma, inverse Gaussian, weighted Lindley and Birnbaum-Saunders as the distribution for the frailty terms. For the basal model, it is considered a parametric approach based on the Weibull and the piecewise exponential distributions and a semiparametric approach. For details, see Gallardo and Bourguignon (2022) arXiv:2206.12973.
